Posts.HTML:
Hello!

My name is Antonin, I am a gamebook fan an I wanted to share my adaptation of the original gamebook written in 1988 by Joe Dever. Freeway Warrior 1: Highway Holocaust

Original illustrations by Melvyn Grant.

I made a playable version and it's playable online here: https://freeway-warrior.neocities.org

The original text/rules/illustrations are untouched, I just created an interface to make it easier to play, no need of paper, pencil etc...

Read the rules first!
It's free, it's made of html javascript jquery and css.

I used the Aon project base to go faster. Thanks to them!

Thank you and have a nice day!
Antonin
